android.car.content.pm

类 CarPackageManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.car.CarManagerBase
      • android.car.content.pm.CarPackageManager

  • public final class CarPackageManager
extends CarManagerBase
    Provides car specific API related with package management.

      void setAppBlockingPolicy(java.lang.String packageName, CarAppBlockingPolicy policy, int flags)
      已过时。 
      It is no longer possible to change the app blocking policy at runtime. The first choice to mark an activity as safe for driving should always be to to include <meta-data android:name="distractionOptimized" android:value="true"/> in its manifest. All other activities will be blocked whenever driving restrictions are required. If an activity's manifest cannot be changed, then you can explicitly make an exception to its behavior using the build-time XML configuration. Allow or deny specific activities by changing the appropriate value (R.string.activityAllowlist, R.string.activityDenylist) within the packages/services/Car/service/res/values/config.xml overlay.
      void setEnableActivityBlocking(boolean enable)
      Enable/Disable Activity Blocking.

    • 字段详细资料

      • FLAG_SET_POLICY_WAIT_FOR_CHANGE

        @Deprecated
public static final int FLAG_SET_POLICY_WAIT_FOR_CHANGE
        已过时。 see the setAppBlockingPolicy(String, CarAppBlockingPolicy, int) documentation for alternative mechanism.
        Flag for setAppBlockingPolicy(String, CarAppBlockingPolicy, int). When this flag is set, the call will be blocked until policy is set to system. This can take time and the flag cannot be used in main thread.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • FLAG_SET_POLICY_ADD

        @Deprecated
public static final int FLAG_SET_POLICY_ADD
        已过时。 see the setAppBlockingPolicy(String, CarAppBlockingPolicy, int) documentation for alternative mechanism.
        Flag for setAppBlockingPolicy(String, CarAppBlockingPolicy, int). When this flag is set, passed policy is added to existing policy set from the current package. If none of FLAG_SET_POLICY_ADD or FLAG_SET_POLICY_REMOVE is set, existing policy is replaced. Note that policy per each package is always replaced and will not be added.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • FLAG_SET_POLICY_REMOVE

        @Deprecated
public static final int FLAG_SET_POLICY_REMOVE
        已过时。 see the setAppBlockingPolicy(String, CarAppBlockingPolicy, int) documentation for alternative mechanism.
        Flag for setAppBlockingPolicy(String, CarAppBlockingPolicy, int). When this flag is set, passed policy is removed from existing policy set from the current package. If none of FLAG_SET_POLICY_ADD or FLAG_SET_POLICY_REMOVE is set, existing policy is replaced.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

        public static final java.lang.String BLOCKING_INTENT_EXTRA_IS_ROOT_ACTIVITY_DO

      • DRIVING_SAFETY_ACTIVITY_METADATA_REGIONS

        public static final java.lang.String DRIVING_SAFETY_ACTIVITY_METADATA_REGIONS
        Metadata which Activity can use to specify the driving safety regions it is supporting.

        Definition of driving safety region is car OEM specific for now and only OEM apps should use this. If there are multiple regions, it should be comma separated. Not specifying this means supporting all regions.

        Some examples are:

        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • MANIFEST_METADATA_TARGET_CAR_VERSION

        public static final java.lang.String MANIFEST_METADATA_TARGET_CAR_VERSION
        Manifest metadata used to specify the minimum major and minor Car API version an app is targeting.

        Format is in the form major:minor or major.

        For example, for Android 13, it would be:

        Or:

        And for Android 13 first update:

    • 方法详细资料

      • onCarDisconnected

        public void onCarDisconnected()
        从类复制的说明: CarManagerBase
        Handle disconnection of car service (=crash). As car service has crashed already, this call should only clean up any listeners / callbacks passed from client. Clearing object passed to car service is not necessary as car service has crashed. Note that Car*Manager will not work any more as all binders are invalid. Client should re-create all Car*Managers when car service is restarted.
        指定者:
        onCarDisconnected 在类中 CarManagerBase

      • setAppBlockingPolicy

        @Deprecated
public void setAppBlockingPolicy(java.lang.String packageName,
                                              CarAppBlockingPolicy policy,
                                              int flags)
        已过时。 It is no longer possible to change the app blocking policy at runtime. The first choice to mark an activity as safe for driving should always be to to include <meta-data android:name="distractionOptimized" android:value="true"/> in its manifest. All other activities will be blocked whenever driving restrictions are required. If an activity's manifest cannot be changed, then you can explicitly make an exception to its behavior using the build-time XML configuration. Allow or deny specific activities by changing the appropriate value (R.string.activityAllowlist, R.string.activityDenylist) within the packages/services/Car/service/res/values/config.xml overlay.
        Set Application blocking policy for system app. FLAG_SET_POLICY_ADD or FLAG_SET_POLICY_REMOVE flag allows adding or removing from already set policy. When none of these flags are set, it will completely replace existing policy for each package specified. When FLAG_SET_POLICY_WAIT_FOR_CHANGE flag is set, this call will be blocked until the policy is set to system and become effective. Otherwise, the call will start changing the policy but it will be completed asynchronously and the call will return without waiting for system level policy change.
        参数:
        packageName - Package name of the client. If wrong package name is passed, exception will be thrown. This name is used to update the policy.
        policy -
        flags -
        抛出:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if caller has no permission.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - For wrong or invalid arguments.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If FLAG_SET_POLICY_WAIT_FOR_CHANGE is set while called from main thread.

      • restartTask

        public void restartTask(int taskId)
        Restarts the requested task. If task with taskId does not exist, do nothing.

        This requires android.permission.REAL_GET_TASKS permission.

      • isActivityBackedBySafeActivity

        public boolean isActivityBackedBySafeActivity(ComponentName activityName)
        Check if finishing Activity will lead into safe Activity (=allowed Activity) to be shown. This can be used by unsafe activity blocking Activity to check if finishing itself can lead into being launched again due to unsafe activity shown. Note that checking this does not guarantee that blocking will not be done as driving state can change after this call is made.
        参数:
        activityName -
        返回:
        true if there is a safe Activity (or car is stopped) in the back of task stack so that finishing the Activity will not trigger another Activity blocking. If the given Activity is not in foreground, then it will return true as well as finishing the Activity will not make any difference.

      • setEnableActivityBlocking

        public void setEnableActivityBlocking(boolean enable)
        Enable/Disable Activity Blocking. This is to provide an option for toggling app blocking behavior for development purposes.

      • isActivityDistractionOptimized

        public boolean isActivityDistractionOptimized(java.lang.String packageName,
                                              java.lang.String className)
        Returns whether an activity is distraction optimized, i.e, allowed in a restricted driving state.
        参数:
        packageName - the activity's android.content.pm.ActivityInfo#packageName.
        className - the activity's android.content.pm.ActivityInfo#name.
        返回:
        true if the activity is distraction optimized, false if it isn't or if the value could not be determined.

      • isPendingIntentDistractionOptimized

        public boolean isPendingIntentDistractionOptimized(PendingIntent pendingIntent)
        Returns whether the given PendingIntent represents an activity that is distraction optimized, i.e, allowed in a restricted driving state.
        参数:
        pendingIntent - the PendingIntent to check.
        返回:
        true if the pending intent represents an activity that is distraction optimized, false if it isn't or if the value could not be determined.

      • isServiceDistractionOptimized

        public boolean isServiceDistractionOptimized(java.lang.String packageName,
                                             java.lang.String className)
        Check if given service is distraction optimized, i.e, allowed in a restricted driving state.
        参数:
        packageName -
        className -
        返回:

      • getCurrentDrivingSafetyRegion

        public java.lang.String getCurrentDrivingSafetyRegion()
        Returns the current driving safety region of the system. It will return OEM specific regions or DRIVING_SAFETY_REGION_ALL when all regions are supported.

        System's driving safety region is static and does not change until system restarts.

      • controlTemporaryActivityBlockingBypassingAsUser

        public void controlTemporaryActivityBlockingBypassingAsUser(java.lang.String packageName,
                                                            java.lang.String activityClassName,
                                                            boolean bypass,
                                                            int userId)
                                                     throws NameNotFoundException
        Enables or disables bypassing of unsafe Activity blocking for a specific Activity temporarily.

        Enabling bypassing only lasts until the user stops using the car or until a user switching happens. Apps like launcher may ask user's consent to bypass. Note that bypassing is done for the package for all android users including the current user and user 0.

        If bypassing is disabled and if the unsafe app is in foreground with driving state, the app will be immediately blocked.

        参数:
        packageName - Target package name.
        activityClassName - Target Activity name (in full class name).
        bypass - Bypass Activity blocking when true. Do not bypass anymore when false.
        userId - User Id where the package is installed. Even if the bypassing is enabled for all android users, the package should be available for the specified user id.
        抛出:
        NameNotFoundException - If the given package / Activity class does not exist for the user.

      • getSupportedDrivingSafetyRegionsForActivityAsUser

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getSupportedDrivingSafetyRegionsForActivityAsUser(java.lang.String packageName,
                                                                                          java.lang.String activityClassName,
                                                                                          int userId)
                                                                                   throws NameNotFoundException
        Returns all supported driving safety regions for the given Activity. If the Activity supports all regions, it will only include DRIVING_SAFETY_REGION_ALL.

        The permission specification requires PERMISSION_CONTROL_APP_BLOCKING and QUERY_ALL_PACKAGES but this API will also work if the client has Car.PERMISSION_CAR_DRIVING_STATE and QUERY_ALL_PACKAGES permissions.

        参数:
        packageName - Target package name.
        activityClassName - Target Activity name (in full class name).
        userId - Android user Id to check the package.
        返回:
        Empty list if the Activity does not support driving safety (=no distractionOptimized metadata). Otherwise returns full list of all supported regions.
        抛出:
        NameNotFoundException - If the given package / Activity class does not exist for the user.

      • getTargetCarVersion

        public CarVersion getTargetCarVersion(java.lang.String packageName)
                               throws NameNotFoundException
        Gets the Car API version targeted by the given package (as defined by MANIFEST_METADATA_TARGET_CAR_VERSION.

        If the app manifest doesn't contain the MANIFEST_METADATA_TARGET_CAR_VERSION metadata attribute or if the attribute format is invalid, the returned CarVersion will be using the target platform version as major and 0 as minor instead.

        Note: to get the target CarVersion for your own app, use getTargetCarVersion() instead.

        返回:
        Car API version targeted by the given package (as described above).
        抛出:
        NameNotFoundException - If the given package does not exist for the user.

      • getTargetCarVersion

        public CarVersion getTargetCarVersion()
        Gets the Car API version targeted by app (as defined by MANIFEST_METADATA_TARGET_CAR_VERSION.

        If the app manifest doesn't contain the MANIFEST_METADATA_TARGET_CAR_VERSION metadata attribute or if the attribute format is invalid, the returned CarVersion will be using the target platform version as major and 0 as minor instead.

        返回:
        targeted Car API version (as defined above)
